Fact-58F6911931C404A926EC4DBFFFDE19C7-wk.ixv:label: Long-term Line of Credit
Fact-58F6911931C404A926EC4DBFFFDE19C7-wk.ixv:terselabel: Line of credit facility, amount outstanding
Fact-58F6911931C404A926EC4DBFFFDE19C7-wk.ixv:documentation: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Fact-FDA33FCFB2408A9C195C4DBFFFFC2E41-wk.ixv:label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate, Maximum
Fact-FDA33FCFB2408A9C195C4DBFFFFC2E41-wk.ixv:documentation: The estimated measure of the maximum percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

d81830327e276-wk-Fact-4A4896BCADDEEEF245.ixv:label: Document Type
d81830327e276-wk-Fact-4A4896BCADDEEEF245.ixv:documentation: The type of document being provided (such as 10-K, 10-Q, 485BPOS, etc). The document type is limited to the same value as the supporting SEC submission type, or the word 'Other'.

d81830327e297-wk-Fact-7CAE1D74A3F5C2D09C.ixv:label: Document Annual Report
d81830327e297-wk-Fact-7CAE1D74A3F5C2D09C.ixv:documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an annual report.

d81830327e339-wk-Fact-51F0B0C0D801CFC9F3.ixv:label: Document Period End Date
d81830327e339-wk-Fact-51F0B0C0D801CFC9F3.ixv:documentation: The end date of the period reflected on the cover page if a periodic report. For all other reports and registration statements containing historical data, it is the date up through which that historical data is presented.  If there is no historical data in the report, use the filing date. The format of the date is CCYY-MM-DD.

d81830327e377-wk-Fact-196B3057C48F662AB7.ixv:label: Document Transition Report
d81830327e377-wk-Fact-196B3057C48F662AB7.ixv:documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a transition report.

d81830327e435-wk-Fact-638A9FBDEB629CC4E8.ixv:label: Entity File Number
d81830327e435-wk-Fact-638A9FBDEB629CC4E8.ixv:documentation: Commission file number. The field allows up to 17 characters. The prefix may contain 1-3 digits, the sequence number may contain 1-8 digits, the optional suffix may contain 1-4 characters, and the fields are separated with a hyphen.

d81830327e438-wk-Fact-3ABA957BB5DA278EEB.ixv:label: Entity Registrant Name
d81830327e438-wk-Fact-3ABA957BB5DA278EEB.ixv:documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

d81830327e459-wk-Fact-9FCFC9CDCB5C5C7AF5.ixv:label: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
d81830327e459-wk-Fact-9FCFC9CDCB5C5C7AF5.ixv:terselabel: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
d81830327e459-wk-Fact-9FCFC9CDCB5C5C7AF5.ixv:documentation: Two-character EDGAR code representing the state or country of incorporation.

d81830327e469-wk-Fact-60F00BEF94F254764A.ixv:label: Entity Tax Identification Number
d81830327e469-wk-Fact-60F00BEF94F254764A.ixv:documentation: The Tax Identification Number (TIN), also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN), is a unique 9-digit value assigned by the IRS.

d81830327e505-wk-Fact-71F10CDB75045D8506.ixv:label: Entity Address, Address Line One
d81830327e505-wk-Fact-71F10CDB75045D8506.ixv:documentation: Address Line 1 such as Attn, Building Name, Street Name

d81830327e510-wk-Fact-00C7CA39229D9EAE7F.ixv:label: Entity Address, City or Town
d81830327e510-wk-Fact-00C7CA39229D9EAE7F.ixv:documentation: Name of the City or Town

d81830327e515-wk-Fact-542B08751E21C24FBF.ixv:label: Entity Address, State or Province
d81830327e515-wk-Fact-542B08751E21C24FBF.ixv:documentation: Name of the state or province.

d81830327e520-wk-Fact-1001796C367B190441.ixv:label: Entity Address, Postal Zip Code
d81830327e520-wk-Fact-1001796C367B190441.ixv:documentation: Code for the postal or zip code

d81830327e797-wk-Fact-C6D050D1ED45FF6BB8.ixv:label: Trading Symbol
d81830327e797-wk-Fact-C6D050D1ED45FF6BB8.ixv:documentation: Trading symbol of an instrument as listed on an exchange.

d81830327e807-wk-Fact-896FB6B0031BE0C1C9.ixv:label: Security Exchange Name
d81830327e807-wk-Fact-896FB6B0031BE0C1C9.ixv:documentation: Name of the Exchange on which a security is registered.

d81830327e942-wk-Fact-2358C7907B1ED74594.ixv:label: Entity Well-known Seasoned Issuer
d81830327e942-wk-Fact-2358C7907B1ED74594.ixv:documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is a well-known seasoned issuer, as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act. Is used on Form Type: 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, 20-F, 6-K, 10-K/A, 10-Q/A, 20-F/A, 6-K/A, N-CSR, N-Q, N-1A.

d81830327e957-wk-Fact-BA72C38BA053C9B84C.ixv:label: Entity Voluntary Filers
d81830327e957-wk-Fact-BA72C38BA053C9B84C.ixv:documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' if the registrant is not required to file reports pursuant to Section 13 or Section 15(d) of the Act.

d81830327e968-wk-Fact-274C59483C607DF62A.ixv:label: Entity Current Reporting Status
d81830327e968-wk-Fact-274C59483C607DF62A.ixv:documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' whether registrants (1) have filed all reports required to be filed by Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that registrants were required to file such reports), and (2) have been subject to such filing requirements for the past 90 days. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

d81830327e981-wk-Fact-2EB62918B5C0FFBC58.ixv:label: Entity Interactive Data Current
d81830327e981-wk-Fact-2EB62918B5C0FFBC58.ixv:documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant has submitted electronically every Interactive Data File required to be submitted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit such files).

d81830327e1013-wk-Fact-6F247ED0CD694F58D.ixv:label: Entity Filer Category
d81830327e1013-wk-Fact-6F247ED0CD694F58D.ixv:documentation: Indicate whether the registrant is one of the following: Large Accelerated Filer, Accelerated Filer, Non-accelerated Filer. Definitions of these categories are stated in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

d81830327e1051-wk-Fact-7F82465FDE503F9E3.ixv:label: Entity Small Business
d81830327e1051-wk-Fact-7F82465FDE503F9E3.ixv:documentation: Indicates that the company is a Smaller Reporting Company (SRC).

d81830327e1061-wk-Fact-58C4A21AC4E0FA590.ixv:label: Entity Emerging Growth Company
d81830327e1061-wk-Fact-58C4A21AC4E0FA590.ixv:documentation: Indicate if registrant meets the emerging growth company criteria.

d81830327e1071-wk-Fact-1E1E746B314883CA7.ixv:label: Entity Shell Company
d81830327e1071-wk-Fact-1E1E746B314883CA7.ixv:documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant is a shell company as defined in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.

d81830327e1085-wk-Fact-38DA1F0C97D39E9B4.ixv:label: Entity Public Float
d81830327e1085-wk-Fact-38DA1F0C97D39E9B4.ixv:documentation: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

d81830327e1092-wk-Fact-3AF7CC62F62DB8DB7.ixv:label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
d81830327e1092-wk-Fact-3AF7CC62F62DB8DB7.ixv:documentation: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.
